mapper.select: select sys_permission.* from sys_permission inner join sys_role_permission on sys_permission.id = sys_role_permission.permission_id inner join sys_role on sys_role.id = sys_role_permission.role_id inner join sys_user_role on sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role.id inner join sys_user on sys_user.id = sys_user_role.user_id where sys_user.username = #{username}
